oracle text:
Power/Toughness: 2/2 
Oracle Text: When Banana Wizard enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

Whenever a basic land enters the battlefield under your control, you may tap or untap target creature.

Flavor Text: "Peel the secrets of the land with the magic of the bananas."
